@@ -2113,0 +2113,7 @@ + *

If the {@code directory} argument is not {@code null}, then if its + * abstract pathname is valid and denotes an existing directory, then the + * file will be created in that directory; otherwise, the file will not + * be created and an {@code IOException} will be thrown. In no case will + * a directory be created at the location specified by the {@code directory} + * argument. + * @@ -2130,1 +2137,2 @@ - * @throws IOException If a file could not be created + * @throws IOException + * If a file could not be created @@ -2152,0 +2160,1 @@ +
